org.sd.io
Class GZIPInputStreamWorkaround

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      java.io.FilterInputStream
          java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream
              java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream
                  org.sd.io.GZIPInputStreamWorkaround
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable
public class GZIPInputStreamWorkaround
extends java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream

GZIPInputStream has a bug in which it erroneously throws a "Corrupt GZip Trailer" IOException on files > 4GB. This class catches and ignores that exception.

Author:
Spence Koehler
